location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from six Bushire merchants, to William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter requesting that Bruce ask Captain Maude of HMS Favoriteto remain in Bushire until a caravan arrives from Shiraz which will be bringing the money the merchants would like to forward to their agents in India.The letter is signed by Hajee Masoon, Aga Abdolla Kamadoonie, Aga Mohomed Aly Ispahany, Hajee Bukr Aly, Aga Mohomed Khorasomy and Aga [?Kadin].
